::DarkMouse::

She took a step forward and then looked at Destructor. "But I don't 
kow anything.   I can see from the spark in that jar on the console 
and those paper taht I read that the spark in the jar is Megatrons.   
Inferno told me that he saw Megatron killed."  tears still rolling 
down her cheeks."Why won't you believe me?"  she still cringed in the 
corner.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Starscream
> 
> Starscream answered Destructor.
> 
> "This mouse is in leage with Megatron. She knows his hiding. She's 
> playing dumb, saying she thinks that this is Megatron's spark here. 
> I'm taking her to the bring until KitKat can deal with her." He 
> motioned ot her with his gun, "Let's go or you fry."
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Trainers(Tamron)
> 
> Prebon saw all the fire power heading towards where the group was 
> before. All sorts of Maximals were out fighting now. They had to be 
> dealt with. He told the Trainers to lower themselves down so they 
> were out fo range of Koj's jamming and scanned them. Most of them 
> didn't have chips implanted in them. Time for new recruits. 
Secretly, 
> Prebon gave the order to form the gestault Tamron, and he gave 
orders.
> 
> "Slayer, forget putting the wolf in stasis. Kill him. Savage, take 
> out the Ark. If we can't win, we will destroy history!"
> 
> Tamron moved along towards the new bots. He fired two rockets 
around 
> the area, and than launched two chips towards Maximals without the 
> chip(Sky Lynx and Trinity) Savage flew up into the air and fired 
two 
> fireballs down onto the main structure of the Ark.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Brix/Fliq
> 
> Brix and Fliq were installing computer boards on the Ark when they 
> heard the battle outside. They ran out and saw two fireballs come 
> down on the Ark.
> 
> "Savage....."
> 
> They both begna firing at where they thought the dragon was.
